mapper.select: select c.article_seq, c.article_title, c.article_content, c.article_date,c.article_file, u.user_nick, g.c_category_name, v.apt_name from community_tb c , user_tb u, c_category_tb g, ( select v_machine_seq, apt_name from v_machien_tb where v_machine_addr = #{user_addr}) as v where c.user_id = u.user_id and c.c_category_seq = g.c_category_seq and c.v_machine_seq = v.v_machine_seq
mapper.insert: insert into community_tb(article_content, article_file, c_category_seq, user_id, v_machine_seq) values( #{article_content},#{article_file}, #{c_category_seq}, #{user_id}, #{v_machine_seq})
mapper.select: select v_machine_seq from v_machine_tb where v_machine_addr=#{user_addr}
